column1: Uchi////I just want to heap praise on the employees here for a minute. I went to Uchi last week for what was supposed to be a date. After waiting at the bar for some time I realized my date wasn't going to show up and I decided to go home. When I told the hostess what happened and asked to take my name off the list
column2: she immediately went and talked to the manager and had my meal paid for. I wish I had gotten her name but if anyone sees this I'd just like to thank her
column3: the manager and the bar staff again for completely turning my bad day around. You all are so sweet and the food was fantastic. Will definitely be coming back soon!
